overview:
Petri Kalske (born 1973), the CEO and founder of Axel Technologies Oy, has a strong background in technology and communication business.At Axel Mr. Kalske is responsible for overall strategic and operational management of the company as well as new business development. Mr. Kalske is also a member of the company’s Board of Directors.

Mr. Kalske has been working in DVB technology area for nearly ten years and prior to that he held several positions in the field of communication, marketing and advertisement. The last seven years Mr. Kalske has worked in managerial positions, being accountable for business development, sales and project management.

Mr. Kalske studied Political Science (Major), Communications and Economics in the University of Turku. He has also accomplished additional studies in marketing and advertisement.
